p: Besides FDA-approved drugs, a variety of natural compounds have been investigated for their antiviral actions on SARS-CoV2, one advantage being that some plants contain more than one active ingredient ( 65); in the case of Nigella sativa its main active substances, nigellidine and Î±-Hederin compare positively to either chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine based on their binding energy with viral proteases ( 68), more information is given in Table III.
